{{cpp/memory/shared_ptr/title|operator&amp;lt;&amp;lt;}}
{{cpp/memory/shared_ptr/navbar}}
{{ddcl|
template&lt; class T, class U, class V &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;U, V&gt;&amp; operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;U, V&gt;&amp; os, const std::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt;&amp; ptr );
}}

Inserts the value of the pointer stored in {{c|ptr}} into the output stream {{c|os}}.

Equivalent to {{c|os &lt;&lt; ptr.get()}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|os|a {{lc|std::basic_ostream}} to insert {{tt|ptr}} into}}
{{par|ptr|the data to be inserted into {{tt|os}}}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
{{c|os}}

===Example===
{{example
|p=true 
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;memory&gt;

class Foo {};

int main()
{
    auto sp = std::make_shared&lt;Foo&gt;();
    std::cout &lt;&lt; sp &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; sp.get() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
0x6d9028
0x6d9028
}}
